title: Bug 7581 - ComboBoxCellEditor sizing issue in property sheet
description: The ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet is not sizing correctly.
OB: When using the ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet, the editor component does not resize properly.
EB: The ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet should resize correctly to fit the content.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the property sheet. 2. Add a cell with a ComboBoxCellEditor to the property sheet. 3. Observe that the ComboBoxCellEditor does not resize correctly when the content is longer than the available space.
